channel.title: Czech Republic on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Czech Republic on FinanClub

item.title: Czech Central Bank Has Fewer Reasons to Hike, Vice Governor Says
item.description: The Czech central bank is less likely to raise interest rates in the near future, according to Vice Governor Marek Moravec. Moravec said that the bank’s main focus is now on supporting economic growth, which has been hit by the war in Ukraine and rising inflation.
